metadata.name: INTROSPECTION
metadata.description:
Creativity has become my way of living. This art portrays myself, how I am constantly being carried away into an infinite loop of creative thinking and a roller-coaster of human emotions. The kaleidoscopic abstract patterns depicts my unlimited possibilities of being a creator.

So, here's to the joy of creating a whole new world inside me.


Video in MP4    2210X1668px
Graphical and illustrations - Adobe Photoshop and Procreate (Safa and Rizs)
Animation works - Adobe After Effects (Rizs)
3D works - Blender (Drupad)
